CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells were fabricated with configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
2. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
3. PSS (Poly(styrene-co-vinyl alcohol))
4. PC71BM (Poly[71-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester])
5. TiOx (Titanium oxide)
6. Al (Aluminum)

Let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like me to identify any other entities in the paragraph!

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

2. TiOx (Titanium oxide)

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells were fabricated with configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In the paragraph you provided, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) - a conductive oxide material used as the anode in the solar cell.
2. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) : PSS (Polystyrene Sulfonate) - a conductive polymer used as the hole transport material in the solar cell.
3. PC71BM (Poly[7,7'-bis(1-naphthyl)-2,1'-bithiophene]) - a conjugated polymer used as the electron transport material in the solar cell.
4. TiOx (Titanium Oxide) - a semiconductor material used as the electron transport material in the solar cell.
5. Al (Aluminum) - a metal used as the cathode in the solar cell.

These are the properties of the materials used in the fabrication of the bulk heterojunction solar cells mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties:

1. PC71BM (Poly[7,7'-bis(1-naphthyl)-2,1'-bithiophene]) - a conjugated polymer used as the electron transport material in the solar cell, with a value of its material property (e.g. conductivity, optical properties) that is relevant to its performance in the solar cell.
2. TiOx (Titanium Oxide) - a semiconductor material used as the electron transport material in the solar cell, with a value of its material property (e.g. conductivity, optical properties) that is relevant to its performance in the solar cell.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PC71BM |
| TiOx |

I have presented the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph. Let me know if you have any further questions!
